about.title: ABOUT
about.subtitle: HI I'M JUAN üñêÔ∏è,
about.descrip:
A junior software developer oriented to create web applications, also highly interested in graphic design.
Comfortable in the utilization of JavaScript and Python, and a basic understanding of backend with Node.
My professional objective is learning the maximum that i can of my first experiences.

pro1.title: 1. BookList
pro1.descrip:
Is a personal library-organisation app made it with the Python framework Django
In this project I've learnt how to work with databases with SQLite and url's system of Django, also is my first experience using Python
In the future i want to make a deleting system and an editing system and also add React Components.

pro2.title: 2. Vite Calculator
pro2.descrip:
Is a basic calculator app made it with the front-end tooling Vite.js for React.js.
In this project i've learnt the usage of React's Hooks, and some CSS styles. The major problem i've faced was properly calculating arithmetic operations.
In the future I plan to expand this application adding functionalities such as square roots or powers

pro3.title: 3. Code-Note App
pro3.descrip:
Is a personal note app made it with the Javascript framework Electron.
In this project I've learnt how to work with the "localStorage" Web API to storage arrays of items. Also how to manipulate via script some DOM elements.
In the future i want to remake it with react and also use some database such us SQLite.
